de.mrapp.android.dialog.drawable

Class ScaleTransitionDrawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
      • android.graphics.drawable.LayerDrawable
        • de.mrapp.android.dialog.drawable.AbstractTransitionDrawable
          • de.mrapp.android.dialog.drawable.ScaleTransitionDrawable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback

    public class ScaleTransitionDrawable
extends AbstractTransitionDrawable
    A layer drawable, which allows to translate between the first and second layer by downscaling the first layer and subsequently upscaling the second layer. Both layers should have the same size.
    Since:
    4.0.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.graphics.drawable.Drawable

      • ScaleTransitionDrawable

        public ScaleTransitionDrawable(@NonNull
                               android.graphics.drawable.Drawable[] layers)
        Creates a new layer drawable, which allows to translate between the first and second layer by downscaling the first layer and subsequently upscaling the second layer.
        Parameters:
        layers - The layers of this drawable as a Drawable array. The array may not be null

        Parameters:
        interpolatedTime - The interpolated time as a Float value. This is a value between 0.0 and 1.0
